name: Different Winter
description: A novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald portraying the extravagance and moral decay of the Jazz Age.

name: We are Business
description: A classic novel by Harper Lee about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

name: Snow at Sunset
description: George Orwell's dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian regime and surveillance state.

name: Company of One
description: Jane Austen's classic romance novel exploring societal expectations and personal values.

name: Narnia
description: Herman Melville's epic tale of Captain Ahab's obsession with the great white whale.

name: The Two Towers
description: J.D. Salinger's novel following disillusioned teenager Holden Caulfield in New York City.
